tool_description:
Imagine and Upscale the prompt with only 1 API call (5 images in total).
Webhook available.
name: Midjourney Auto Upscale
title: Midjourney Auto Upscale

api_list.name: Imagine and Upscale
api_list.description:
This command run the imagine command and upscale the 4 images, when is ready returns the main image, and the upscaled images (5 images in total).

It requries a prompt parameter and an optional webhook parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com/imagine-and-upscale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Upscale
api_list.description:
Run the upscale command in Midjourney to upscale images from generated with the imagine command.

Send a variant parameter containing the number to base the image on. The API returns a job_id that can be used to check status on the status endpoint.

Optionally, provide a webhook parameter to be notified via webhook when the job completes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com/upscale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Imagine
api_list.description:
Run the imagine command in Midjourney to generate images from text prompts.

Send a prompt parameter containing the text to base the image on. The API returns a job_id that can be used to check status on the status endpoint.

Optionally, provide a webhook parameter to be notified via webhook when the job completes.

The imagine endpoint handles submitting the prompt to Midjourney and kicking off the image generation process. Retrieve completed high-quality images using the job_id and status endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com/imagine"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "midjourney-auto-upscale.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
